## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7e1efcaba98a4db72e85c952c1936c99152081de71c2732e8189d9ad65390116)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@aoflmkt/is-desktop' @ 100.100.106 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
